game.name: Age of Enchantment
game.shortDescription: Tower defense deckbuilder with D&D-inspired classes. Enchant towers with powerful buffs, sacrifice cards to forge new synergies, and level up your Commander. Defend, die, learn, repeat.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tower defense deckbuilder with D&D-inspired classes. Enchant towers with powerful buffs, sacrifice cards to forge new synergies, and level up your Commander. Defend, die, learn, repeat.
